comment: I live in a "diverse" community, pretty peaceful neighborhood really. I have a big garden in my front yard, out there all the time working. Speak with A LOT of based black dudes. It is enlightening. Their children attend the elem school houses up from me. Even the Mexicans are getting based around here. I encourage this.
